comments.body: Maybe stick a TODO comment here explaining that eventually this should be eliminated in favor of sharing xcode_backend.sh between iOS and macOS?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@# Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style license that can be
# found in the LICENSE file.

# TODO(jonahwilliams): refactor this and xcode_backend.sh into one script
# once macOS supports the same configuration as iOS.

comments.body: At some point we should probably unfork this behavior relative to iOS, and put it in the platform directory rather than the build products (updating the example project accordingly). Definitely doesn't need to be now though; maybe when we merge the two scripts, since that'll be a breaking change across the "API" boundary here too.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +42,46 @@# Copy the framework and handle local engine builds.
framework_name = "FlutterMacOS.framework"
derived_dir="${SOURCE_ROOT}/../build/macos/Build/Products/flutter_framework"
framework_path="${FLUTTER_ROOT}/bin/cache/artifacts/engine/darwin-x64"
flutter_framework="${framework_path}/${framework_name}"
